article:
'Data binding' is general technique that binds two data/information sources
together and maintains synchronization of data. This is usually done with two
data/information sources with different languages as in XML data binding. In UI
data binding data and information objects of the same language but different
logic function are bound together (e.g. Java UI elements to Java objects).

If the binding has been made in the proper manner, each data change is reflected
automatically by the elements that are bound to the data. The term data binding
is also used in cases where an outer representation of data in an element
changes, and the underlying data is automatically updated to reflect this
change. As an example, a change in a TextBox element could modify
the underlying data value. [http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-
us/library/ms752347.aspx#what_is_data_binding What is data binding?]
